Noob Killers be like , I DIDNT KILL THEM ALL I LOSE THE GAME AND A RANK, SURVIVOR OP, IMPOSSIBLE TO RANK, ALT-F4, why cant i get points

Good Killers be like , I Killed 1-2 Still got pip and 17k score,  

The spots were they can perma juke is cancer the tree with the cow and 2 vaults around it, had a lvl 50 who start of game ran there knew the map inside out i couldnt even trap it he was already there , and he had all ultra rare from dif characters would juke at spot were i could not catch him then if i trapped sprinted with perk to other haha wanted to get him for a laugh since i had not vsed a high level and it was real easy games mostly but you can just leave lobby if you see these characters high level and your killer is low level. Really need a balance for Perks, Killer with no perks or 1 cannot beat 4 rare ultra rare Survivor unless they are boosted monkeys or dont know how to window whore, other than that no complaints about Killer. Survivor is easy once you learn how to score points and the mechanics of the game. Holding shift everywhere and complaining the wraith is OP will not get you a pip. 5 percent of people seem to know how tracking works maybe get a friend and go private and see how it works instead of crying on discussion. Crying about bugs is fine but not about mechanics in the game you dont know anything about. If you buy this game do not care about rank its means shit just try to enjoy it on your own is very immersive. When they fix the bugs and rank hopefully makes it better.

game is good and i would recomend it. Has a few unique elements that makes it a fun multiplayer game. Game play is fun and each game can be different. Now some of the cons are that the matchmaking is slow. Not sure if it would effect the gameplay but i believe a limited range voice chat would be useful. (cant talk to allies accross the map but if you are next to each other) I beleive the game is still young and will get better as the devs add some polish.

Игруха супер! )) 
- Подойдет как любителям поохотиться на человечишек, так и любителям повыживать. 
- Огромные возможности для реализации ваших стелс-способностей. Можно спрятаться в траве, за деревом - ведь против Вас не тупой бот, а реальный игрок-маньяк, который видит местность так же как и вы, но вот только от первого лица. 
- Играть интересно за обе стороны, так как баланс по играбельности на высоте. 
- Можно поохотиться на друзей. Жаль вот только все бои 1х4, других режимов не предусмотрено. 
- Можно прокачивать абилки, дающие вам небольшие преимущества. Но и использовать их так же надо уметь, то есть скилл здесь реально решает. 
- Отличный саундтрэк!
- Есть 4 типа выживших и 3 типа маньяка, у каждого из них свои абилки/инструменты расправы. 
- Есть система рангов от 20 до 1. 
10/10

Dead by Daylight'ın sunduğu atmosferi sunan çok az oyun var, bu açıdan kendini ön plana çıkarıyor ve oldukça eğleniyorsunuz oynarken. Yine de birçok eksiği var bunlardan bahsetmeden olmaz.

20.06.2016 tarihinde yazılmıştır.
Eksiklerinin ileride düzeleceğine inandığım ve oynarken keyif aldığım için tavsiye ediyorum, yine de eksik olarak nitelendirdiklerimi okuyun ve kararınızı buna göre verin derim.

+'lar

+Oyun seansları kısa sürüyor. Bu sayede çok zamanınız olmadığı zamanlarda da kafa dağıtmak için 2 oyun atıp çıkayım diyebiliyorsunuz. (Oyunun başlaması uzun sürebiliyor, o sırada başka bir işinizi halledeceğinizi düşünerek bunu söylüyorum)

+Eğer oyunu birlite oynayabileceğiniz 5 kişilik bir arkadaş grubunuz varsa özel lobi kurup çok eğlenceli vakit geçirebilirsiniz.

+Kendi karakterinizi daha iyi tanımanızı sağlıyor :D Sizinle orada mahsur kalmış diğer kişiyi kurtarmaya çalışmak mı, özgürlüğe koşmak mı? 

+Her bir katil ve tutsak çeşidi farklı bir oyun deneyimi sunuyor, oynadığınız karaktere göre stratejinizi bir hayli değiştiriyorsunuz bu da oyundan kolay kolay sıkılmamanızı sağlıyor.

-'ler

-Katil olarak oynamak istediğinizde çok uzun zaman beklemeniz gerekiyor. Oyunu kendi internet bağlantınız üzerinden hostluyorsunuz bu yüzden size en yakın oyuncuları bulmaya çalışıyor. Bu da katil olarak oyuna girebilmek için en az 10dk beklemeniz demek. En azından Türkiye için şu an durum böyle. 

-Oyunun derecelendirme sistemi tam anlamıyla bozuk. Rank atlamak istiyorsanız oyunun açıklarını kullanmanız gerekiyor. (Sürekli olarak tuzak hazırlayıp, geri alıp tekrar aynı yere kurmak gibi) Ayrıca katil olarak oynadığınız bir oyun sırasında 3 kişiyi öldürdünüz harika bi oyun çıkarıyorsunuz diyelim, son kalan kişi bilerek internetini kapattığı anda (dc) oyun bitiyor ve o kişi yüzünden rank düşebiliyorsunuz. Aynı şey tutsak olarak oynarken de geçerli, katil dc olursa çok az puan topladığınız gerekçesiyle rank düşüyorsunuz. DC olan kişiye bir şey olmuyor, millet böyle rank 1'e kadar kasıyor :)

-Arkadaşlarınızla dereceli girme diye bir şey yok sadece özel lobi kurabiliyorsunuz. Bu yüzden millet arkadaşıyla aynı lobiye denk gelmek için sürekli gir çık yapıyor lobilere, bu da oyunların başlama zamanını bir hayli uzatıyor.

-Çok fazla glitch var. Katil astığı oyuncunun arkadaşları tarafından kurtarılmasını tamamen engelleyebiliyor mesela. Ya da merdivende durarak bodrumdan çıkamamalarına neden olabiliyor, 

-Oyun yeni çıktığı için eşleştirme sistemi henüz iyi çalışmıyor. Dilerseniz oyun başlamadan bu durumu fark edip lobiden çıkabilirsiniz tabii ki ama rank 1 oyuncuyla rank 20 oyuncunun aynı oyuna girebilmesi dahi garip bi durum. (Çünkü oyun tecrübesini bir kenara koyalım, seviye atladıkça gelen yeni eşyalar, perkler vesaire fazlasıyla fark yaratıyor)

Update #2, 2 years after the other update. I've been playing DBD for 6 years now and I'm very disappointed that this game has deviated from the concept of horror cat and mouse gameplay to "omg look whos gay now, teehee" and pride charm collection sprees. The devs are obviously now a group of midwit progressive activists who are more interested in pushing their politics than they are making the game worth playing in the future. The core player base like myself, who have plenty of f*ck you money to spend, aren't spending as much with DBD anymore. But hey, at least they got their rocks off with making David gay, amarite?

My only hope is that this game dies, which it will, with some kind of dignity or is sold off to another developer with skill and ability. 

6 years ago, this was a "recommend."
Now? No. Not until they scrap the dev team and make the game about the game, rather than their midwit political views.

**********
I typically wait until at LEAST 10 hours before I consider leaving a review. There's nothing I can't stand more than douchebags writing reviews after 1-3 hours of game time as though they had any insight or valuable experience to share. Keep in mind, I've only logged 11 hours; so there's a ton to the game I have yet to really get into. 

First off, this game is everything a hide and hunt SHOULD be about. There is no pay to win mechanic, no pay for added content, none of that garbage.  This game is precisely what it says it's going to be and it does NOT disappoint. The ambience coincides amazingly with the pace of the game. The objectives and metrics of which you gain blood points is balanced and reasonable. Speaking of balance, this is the FIRST game in a long time that I've sat down and had not once thought to myself, "Wow, ( x ) is really weak and needs a buff" or "Wow, ( x ) is really broken and needs to be balanced."

Some things I hope to see in the future would obviously be a party system. I'd love to have the option to play the game AND accumulate blood points. Obviously this would open the current system to abuse and exploitation, but with enough innovation I could see the devs coming up with a plausible solution. Another small qualm I have with the current system is how unforgivable the pip meter can be. If you're matched with a group of lower ranked players, I think the reduction of blood points on your pip meter should be lesser than if you were in a group of equally ranked players.

All in all, this game is 10/10 so far. Disregard the mouth breathers who play a game for 1-4 hours and convince themselves they know anything about a game. Good luck, have fun!

EDIT:

Several years have passed since I did this review and I have to say- the game has only gotten better. The content releases and balances is awesome and I definitely recommend this game to everyone who claims they like survival games.

Okay I like this game though it has many flaws. I only played the killer not the survivors yet until later patches. The reason why is this. First match was fine got two kills as wraith. Second match however bug happen when I decloaked to a generator with three people when decloaked went for a grab since one was focus on getting it ready. glitch through the map and fell downed for a straight minut. had to end the game prematurly for that. Third match people who spammed medics and somehow spots me when I was cloaked. Now I know you can still be seen when cloaked but only close range, I did a full B-line patrol of all the generators suddenly 4 were online only got one kill due to body camping cause one medics and two hook was right at entrance, and finallyI was mad because when I was cloak patrolling I was seen somehow. Finally was the maps. They were greatly build no lie there. But building and obstacle design placement even random was way to much for the survivors wining. Why? because a player played chase me if you can with a house were I can't catch at all. Now didn't use the hillibily chage but that just for clearing distance this chase wasn't. So the obstacles was way to much into survivors especially a person can just keep vaulting again and again. I don't like cheap surviving tactis like this and this my bad review for now unless these obstacles gets nerfed or the survivors have a stamina bar. The reason why it should happen is to at least limit perfect victory for the survivor. This should at least helped killer players a bit and makes the game fair.

Best game 10/10.

Great game, Basically a 1v4 cat and mouse game with a horror-coating. The game has a lot of diversity, uniqueness and dynamic going for it. No game will be the same even when playing with the exact same players over and over... The diversity is the maincatcher for me.

Though the game had a lot of bugs (even a lot of gamebreaking bugs that persistent after official release) their 1st patch after official removed a lot of my doubt on them.



Just make sure you diversify with other games because if you nolife this game some players might find it a bit one-sided after a 10-hour session or so.

I came back to DbD after 3 years and even thought some issues have been fix I still cannot recommend the game. This is mostly due to MatchMaking, The firsts rank are a charm, people are learning survivors and learning killer with minimal perks, people are having fun and enjoying the game. In these ranks you find mostly casual gamers looking for a good time. Where everything goes south is when you reach around rank 12-13 or so. Then matchmaking matches you with rank 16 to rank 1 prestige, thus can be frustrating for the low as the high ranked. When you play killer you get matched with low rank survivor, example rank 12 Killer will 80% be matched with survivor rank 7 or better, this is due to the fact that there is less killers than survivors playing the game. This is the reason why finding a match for survivor takes many minutes whereas finder as a killer take a couple of seconds. When you reach those rank be ready for the downfall of the community, this is where everything gets toxic, boring and frustrating. After passing many hours of fun you get stuck in those ranks. As a primary killer player, if I win the match (ie: get more points than survivors) you're gonna get call a tunneler, camper, cheap shot etc... If you lose the match (less points than average of survivor) then you will be said you suck, get rekd etc... Whatever you do you receive toxic comments. (Take note a never initiate any conversation in the chat windows and thanks god that people on other platform cannot chat, dealing with PC players is more than enough).

Here, I am not talking about winning or loosing, that is part of a game like this one. I am talking about how everyone threat the other players, the toxicity in the way to play the game and the in chat window and it goes for both survivor and killer. This game gets the worst out of people, players are frustrated about previous match and it's always all about vengeance and making the other player look bad, it not about having fun. 

When you play game you want to have fun, enjoy yourself , sadly in this game when reaching lower rank this is not the case and this is because of the toxic community around the game.

I played many games, Siege, Dota, Battelfield, Evolve, named them and the community of DbD is by far the worst.

So for the second time in many years, I will stop playing this game. It's sad because I like the theme, the idea but the mix of Matchmaking and community forces me to abandon and have fun elsewhere.

Am Wraith. Chasing down the running meat.
Two have already fallen to my axe and been sacrificed to the nether beings. A third decides to flee to shelter and I pursue.

It jumps in the window, I run around. It jumps out the window, I run around. It jumps in the window again and begins taunting. It jumps out the window and taunts again.

I decide to teach it a lesson...

I stare at it and ring the bell. Over and over and over again. Never moving, always watching, always ringing.

It's taunts have now become agitated and frightened. It knows it cannot leave the house, but it cannot stay there forever. Minutes pass. I continue to stare and ring the bell over and over and over again.

It's motions become sluggish and distracted. I strike without warning.

Caught off guard, the chase does not last long. I bring it to the hook-altar, and am about to go after the one remaining sacrifice, and then I realize the lesson is not yet over.

I stand before the sacrifice, awaiting the nether beings, and I begin to ring the bell.

Over and over and over again.

Prey can run. Prey can hide. Prey needs to be careful when it tea bags a serial killer with mystical powers.

I don't think I've ever asked for a refund for a game and I was really looking forward to this. 

Not only is it a nightmare to get into a game with a friend - either play with friends only in a private match (which means you need at least 5 people that are friends the game for a full match) or - the craziest way, keep hitting join and hope that you end up in the same lobby (me and my friend tried for half an hour and it never happened. We ended up going on forums to find people to play with. 
The entire time, the game chat doesnt work in the game, and steam chat doesnt either because the game takes control of the mike. 

But all those technical issues aside, the gameplay itself just isn't that good. The atmosphere is fantastic and for the most part I think the game looks pretty decent. 
However, after playing two rounds I soon identified that there were dominant strategies when playing as the survivors, which you could just pull off over and over again. 

I first noticed when I was being a spectator after dying (which btw is incredibly boring as you can barely see anything with the way the camera is tilted). I found as a survivor there were dominant strategies that  gave them a huge advantage and made it almost impossible for the killer to catch them...which ruined the fun. The fact that you can't actually kill the survivors yourself is a disappointment too. You can't deliver the finishing blow. You knock the player down, and drag them to a hook where they stay until their time depletes or another player saves them. The game mode gets quite repetitive very quickly, and I only played a handful of rounds. 

It's a shame. It's a game I really want to like but you spend a frustrating amount of time trying to get the game going, and once you finally get to play, the buzz is already somewhat gone, and the shortcomings of the gameplay just hit you that little harder. 

I love the Idea, I hope they fix the technical issues and tweak some gameplay elements. They've clearly worked hard on this game, but I don't think it's fair to have released it in its current state, and if feels like far more play testing should have been done - so for now I'm out.

I understand all of the negative reviews and do want more menu options especially, but this game really isn't that buggy. People complaining about the ranking system are trying to play this game without much thought or improvement. It is hard, but that is what makes it rewarding. The fact some actions aren't punishable yet is annoying, but it isn't game breaking at all. I give this game 9/10 and will be a 10/10 when it resolves its small issues.

Oyunu büyük bir heyecan ile satın almıştım sonra oyunu indirdim kurdum ve girdim ilk oyuna girdiğimde optimizasyon sorunu olduğunu fark ettim grafiği low'a çekmeme rağmen oyunda buglar ve donmalar oluyordu bir hüsran yaşadım halbuki sistem gereksinimlerim oldukça yeterli idi bir anlam veremedim herelde beta sürümü olduğundan dolayı farz ediyorum.Onun dışında farklı güzel bir oyun deneyimi yaşayabilirsiniz arkadaşlarınızla oynadığınızda çok hoş vakit geçirebilirsiniz.Tam çerezlik oyun öneririm fakat Optimizasyon sorunu herşeyi bitiriyor...

A fresh approach to asymmetrical multiplayer. I had my doubts at first, but most of the issues that plagued the game at launch are very easy to fix. At the moment (19 June 2016), a party system needs to be patched in, but according to the devs, it will be coming soon.

Playing as the survivors is a nerve wracking experience, as each player-controlled killer is unpredictable. Forget good ol stealth games where the AI has scripted movement. You are dealing with a real person that can decide to use reverse-psychology or just make your life a living hell. 

Playing as the killer tests a different skillset, where you need to try predict survivors' movements and work out how to take them down. 

Pro's:
- Run or hide, your choice
- Each killer plays differently and requires different tactics
- Extensive ranking system with randomly generated skill trees
- Shows you what kind of person you would be in a life or death situation

Cons
- Party system needs to be implemented (at time of writing this review)
- Few bugs scattered about
- Prepare for facepalms if your team are a bunch of headless chickens that lure the killer to your generator or hiding place

Personal verdict: 8.5/10 - Good value for the price

игра сама по себе довольно неплохая, однако есть один главный минус- система рангов. она просто отвратительна! Почему ранк сливается после первой слитой катки? почему нельзя оставлять ранк даже после поражения??? допустим у тебя был 20 ранк, затем ты апнул его до 19. This is one of the most fun games I have gotten my hands upon. It has a simplistic style of gameplay that brings hours of fun with all the new people you meet and possibilities across the way. Although it is a little challenging to rank up, it's not so hard if you have a good team that actually tries to help each other. The leveling system has unique perks and a variety of items you can bring into the fray. I can't organize a lobby of friends together which is a little dissapointing, but it will eventually and hopefully be added in later updates.
Overall I recommend you play this game, it's countless fun and has many possibilities, at least for me.

As a deaf player. The visual cues in this game are amazing.

Trapper. Set traps at various locations, cant hear people running so i just scan the mist. Bam. Survivor gets caught in the jaws of a trap. On the hook you go. Set another trap and wait. Hooked survivors friend rocks up, chink! Got him.

Games great. 9/10 as a deaf killer. I dont need hearing, only bodies.

Итак, наблюдаю за этой игрой уже 3 года. Если в начале разработчики действительно пытались сделать игру лучше, то теперь на нее тупо забили. Постоянные баги никого не удивляют. Забагонное лобби, бесконечная загрузка, отсутствие баланса, поломанная система рангов, очень токсичное комьюнити, долгое ожидание игры за маньяка. Это уже фишка дбд. С каждым патчем новые баги заменяют старые. А некоторые давно стали символом разгильдяйства разрабов.
Новые маньяки уже просто халтура. Очень убого выглядят. Ходячие болванчики для 20ых рангов. А последний тупо издевательство. Помесь Майкла и Свиньи в убогом балахоне.
В новой главе, кроме маньяка, ничего не добавили. Ни карты, ни сурва. Одни только обещания. И судя по полному обсёру с Гост Фейсом на ПТБ, нам следует ожидать такого же в дальнейшем. 
Итог:
Это не просто параша гейм. Это самая настоящая золотая жила, где можно рубит бабло с лохов, которые купят любое dерьмо в обёртке. И буду его неистового защищать, пока не понёрфят и не превратят в Фредди.

Não é atoa que o game é o mais vendido do Steam no momento, o jogo é muito bom e barato. Esse game é daqueles que vc pega e não consegue parar de jogar. O game tem elementos de RPG como skills, rank, itens para equipar, item para adicionar nevoeiro no mapa e etc. Cada sobrevivente tem skills especificas, assim como cada assassino tem skills diferentes. A ambientação e som do game se encaixam muito bem com a atmosfera de terror.

I had to ask for a refund.

It's one of those games where its more fun to watch other people playing than actually play it.

It says coop but you don't have any communication with your team mates so you must consider you're alone. Killer and survivors keep disconnecting to not lose rank, so a survivor is caught you can expect they'll disconnect from the game.

The game mechanics it's basically press space at the right time to get things done without the killer notice you and if he does just keep jumping in and out of a window and you're invencible.

The idea is pretty cool, but the execution is poorly done so the gameplay is boring.

Malgrè ces défauts d'équilibrage et le manque de contenu et de variété (pourquoi pas des objectifs différents des générateurs ?), ce jeu a un potentiel de malade. Il est fun des deux côtés, même si j'ai une préférence pour les survivants où le stress est bien présent et les choix parfois difficiles (tenter de sauver un mec ou bien se barrer :p).

En pensant que ça ne peut être que mieux avec les futures MAJ, je le conseille vivement à tout fan d'horreur et/ou d'infiltration. (ou bien aux sadiques côté monstre :p)

Concernant le matchmaking avec des copains, je ne suis pas sur que je sois pour. J'ai envie de jouer avec mes potes clairement. Mais je pense aussi que pouvoir communiquer et s'organiser risque de dénaturer le jeu et le sentiment qui en ressort (comme tous les jeux d'horreurs où il y a de la coop en fait). Le fait qu'on soit avec des individus avec lequel on ne communique pas rend le tout bien plus oppressant à mes yeux.

[b][i]Note: Game time listed is not accurate due to most time spent during the alpha/beta phases of the game.[/i][/b]

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*] Very cool slasher game concept.
[*] The devs have listened to some feedback and finally implemented partying with friends.
[*] Mostly unique abilities between killers.
[*] The audio does a good job of making moments truly feel intense/scary.
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[*] Still too many exploitable game mechanics make for boring games when played with long-time players.
[*] Matchmaking takes an un-needed amount of time.
[*] DLC packs being sold before fully finishing the base game leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
[/list]

[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]

Recommended to wait for the Friday the 13th game releasing early 2017, then compare features between the two to decide on your purchase. While this game has the advantage of allowing for more unique killers, F13th may provide better game mechanics in general.

This is one of the most fun yet frustrating games I've played. But horror games have always been frustrating. It's a reasonably original game that pits 4 survivors against one of three killers (each with their own unique abilities) Players also have access to their own skills and even equipable items to help them in games.
One of the game's biggest drawbacks is that can't play with less than 4 other friends, i.e. you and a few friends can't join public servers, you have to create a private games, but I've been only playing online with strangers anyway. 
There is occasional lag but that's down to ping and not the game itself. I've only encountered one or two glitches myself, the ranking up system however needs some fixes. But levelling up characters to gain new items and perks is more than enough of an incentive to keep playing. The Killers seems slightly overpowered at the moment *especially the wraith* however it's better that it's slightly easier for the killer than the survivor as it makes the game more tense. Overall worth picking up if you have $15-$20 to spend on a fun survival horror game. Definitely good value for money.
I only play this game with friends since matchmaking is a complete joke, so for the love of all that's holy, give me rewards for spending time in this game with friends.
Amazing game 144hours into it ,  i had a blast , i would rate it 11/10

https://youtu.be/_DWkzDiq3e4 (Some gameplay if your curious to see it before buying)

This game is a bit of a mixed bag but I would suggest that you still check it out if this type of game is your thing. It's an asymmetrical co-op horror survival game.

The gameplay itself is solidly done and engaging. You feel llike you are being hunted as a survivor and you feel unstoppable as the killer but the game suffers from a few problems as well.

The game definitely has a problem with leavers trying to avoid losing points or rage quitting for being captured or something along those lines. The game also has some lag issues due to how the hosting of the game works. I do hope however that these issues are sorted out as the game is updated. And when that happens we will be left with a solid arena survival-horror game.
